name: Destination In Imagination
description:
KingdomOfGamez biggest release is finally here!

Destination in imagination is a 3D puzzle game where you have to use your mind to finish different levels, The game talks about a character who cursed by a magician and now the character -Under the name of Fred- will sleep forever until he finish his dream, If he fell then he will try again until he finish the dreams, The magician made 36 dreams for him to finish and 4 bosses in the last level of each world, But the developer of the game -Me- won't let Fred go alone so I am with him all the time, I am telling him everything about the game, And I am teaching him how to finish this magician, The game is still in progress and cost nothing, It is completely FREE this is the FREE DEMO of the game, The finished game will cost a little big of money, But I added an alternate price just to support this game, I am alone and I am have no resourced or support except from Family and friends, Big thank to Roa for supporting me! But anyway I have to make models, rig them, animate them, texture them and then program them and put all the pieces together, So I need your support in the one :D, Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy playing this game!
